title: 1st floor of house. Heat & Hot Water & WiFi. Back Yard
posting_body: Sunny one bedroom apartment on the entire first floor of a two family house.
- Heat, Hot Water and high speed WiFi included.
- Quiet location at the end of a cul-de-sac
- 5 min walk to St. Elizabeth Hospital and Brighton Center
- 10 min walk to Allston Union square
- 10 Min Walk to Green Line on Commonwealth ave.
- Less than 5 minute walk to #57 bus to BU, Kenmore Square and Watertown Square
- 5 minute walk to #64 bus to Central Square and Kendall Square
- 5 minute walk to #86 bus to Cleveland circle and Harvard Square and Harvard Business School
- 5 minute walk to the new Boston Landing along with New Balance building and WBGH building
- Only Requires first month and last month's rent.
